title: NFL WEEK 3: Our official predictions for who wins this weekend
text:
Week 2 of the 2019 NFL season is in the books as teams look to assess where they are and what the rest of the season will have in store.

There are 0-2 teams out there looking to avoid three straight losses all but dashing their hopes of a spot in the postseason, and there are 2-0 teams surprised with their success and trying to keep the train running.

With Week 3 action fast approaching, we're once again picking every game on the schedule against the spread.

Take a look below at our best bets against the spread for Week 2 of the NFL season (* indicates home team).

LAST WEEK: 11-5 OVERALL: 18-14
description: This week we're backing the Packers, Cowboys, and Patriots to cover big numbers in front of their home crowds.
